title: Incorrect Evelynn preview.
body:
Pls, check Evelynn preview in there. What is this? (Image below)
[>> Evelynn is fourth from left <<](http://i.imgur.com/wzBXJcN.png)

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're looking into this.
Yes! I was going to post this as well. The preview is using the cropped dimensions of Evelynn's old splash art. You'll notice that the old Evelynn stands in that part of the frame. {{champion:28}}
